#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	int t,i,j,n,p,a[1000],sum;
	cin >> t;
	while (t--) {
		sum = 0;
		cin >> n;
		cin >> p;
		for(i = 0 ; i < n ; i++)
			cin >> a[i];
		for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			if (a[i] >= p) {
				sum++;
			}
			else {
				break;
			}
		}
		cout << sum << endl;
			
	}
}
